name: Engine Sim Compiled Asset
summary: Learn about .YSCE files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Engine Sim uses YSCE files to represent visual and audio components that appear in the engine simulation environment. For example, a YSCE file might contain data for engine components, sound effects, or visual materials that define how an engine looks and behaves in the simulation.
NOTE: AngeTheGreat, also known as Ange Yaghi, develops Engine Sim.

instructions: YSCE files are not meant to be opened. Instead, Engine Sim automatically reads and loads them when running the simulation.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
